title: Does anyone here love the game but doesn't have a lot of time to play? Advice?
body: I used to play League 20+ hours a week, which was great! I had the time to and I loved the game. It was around that stage where I climbed from B5 to S5. Now I find myself lucky if I get 10 hours in a week. And since having less time to play, I find myself not being able to climb and have been stuck in S5 for the looooongest time. It almost feels like I have to relearn the game every time I jump back on. Is anyone on the same boat? And how do YOU guys climb?

replies.body:
>feels like I have to relearn the game every time I jump back on. 

me too!, well kinda
I main garen, so there is not really much to relearn, so i just jump back into ranked. 

How do i climb? I play garen 
full gameplay of how i play garen : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=g0nFDHILtqk&spfreload=10
Yo you're on my friends list... I think I spectated you once, doesn't seem like you need much assistance dude :) Hahaha Plus aren't you in Plat? That's pretty good
Oh wait! You're Dota2forthewin aren't you?!?!

> [{quoted}](name=Olee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tXHfz6Z5,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-12T12:15:46.836+0000)

OHH

so thats you, i knew you as FIlAm, then was wondering who the hell was tsm bjer xd

now i know
I think I've vsed you as tsm bjerg wannabe in norms
Oh foreal? Haha on what account?
My smurf which must not be named lol

Don't look at your losses. Just focus on improving. There are a few things that distinguish silver 5 from Gold 5 (in my experience.) Maybe watch some league tutorials. How to marksmen. how to top.. How to attack move.. Objectives.. Even mechanics. Maybe learn a new role and focus on that role as much as you can. What are your main roles now?  My main acc was gold 5 and climbing very quickly but then I went on tilt but it's sitting at silver 2 at the moment still climbing. Just haven't had time to rank.

That's the problem, I don't have the time :( And yeah I used to look at that stuff a lot! But I suppose to could go back to watching some stuff and reading about some stuff on the train! That hadn't crossed my mind, thanks man. 

And I've been a mid main for a while now. Ahri is my main champion by miles and miles, she is my first pick go-to and my go-to when I don't know WHO to play. She was the champion I binged on to carry myself from Bronze 2 to Silver 5. But I play lots of other mid laners, although no where near as much as I play Ahri.

Yeah man, I eat at my desk so I can watch some league streams or youtube videos. Yeah I was like that with teemo. If you think you have ahri down pat, start experimenting.. I played teemo from my first 50 games to 500 games..  I learnt the game with him and then moved on. If I play teemo I feel i have the skill permanent cause I learnt him so well. So i can fall back on him.. My advice is learn a new role like jg
